snippet: In a game lasting 4 hours 2 minutes, the Yankees beat the Red Sox, taking three of the four games in the series, to head into the All-Star break with the best record in baseball, 52-33.
abstract: New York Yankees defeat Boston Red Sox, 7-3, taking three of four games in their series at Fenway; Yankees head into the All-Star break with the best record in baseball, 52-33.
lead_paragraph: In a game lasting 4 hours 2 minutes, the Yankees beat the Red Sox, taking three of the four games in the series, to head into the All-Star break with the best record in baseball, 52-33.

headline.seo: Yankees Beat Red Sox Heading Into All-Star Break
headline.main: Yankees Pick Up Game Heading Into Break, but It Takes a While
headline.print_headline: Yankees Pick Up Another Game Heading Into Break, but It Takes a While
